objects.title: Polo & Pan @ Tantra July 2021
objects.content:
Polo & Pan brings their enchanting world to Tulum, be prepared for a night full of dance and magic with this french duo.


  • Dress Code: Smart Casual dinner (no swimwear, shoes required)
  • From: 8pm to 1 am
  • Limited Capacity
  • NO REFUND POLICY

metafields.title: lineup
metafields.value:
Polo & Pan / France

Polo & Pan comes to Tulum with their particular fusion of genres with trippy dance tracks.

metafields.title: extra_content
metafields.value:
Artists


Polo & Pan

French Duo was formed in 2013 by Paul Armand Delille and Alexandre Grynszpan.

They are recognized globally for their unique style that mixes electronic and tropical music.


Polo & Pan performed at venues like LA’s Novo, London’s Printworks, NY’s Terminal 5, Montreal’s MTELUS, and Coachella Festival.

The Album Caravelle with their single Nanã was certified Gold France.



Polo & Pan last single "Ani Kuni" was released in 2021.

Venue

Tantra Bohemian Luxury Beach Club in Tulum a place between nature and sophistication.

Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 7, Tulum Beach, Zona Hotelera, 77780 Tulum, Q.R.



Contact Concierge for reservations


whatsapp
sms
telegram

objects.title: Circoloco @ Zamana 2022
objects.content: Circoloco  is amongst the most sought after party brands in the world and has multiple residencies artists.

metafields.title: caption
metafields.value: THE DC-10 CLUB IN IBIZA, CIRCOLOCO HAS GROWN INTO A GLOBAL MUSIC BRAND

metadata.caption: THE DC-10 CLUB IN IBIZA, CIRCOLOCO HAS GROWN INTO A GLOBAL MUSIC BRAND

objects.title: Renaissance 30 Anniversary @ Zamna
objects.content:
The Renaissance label has released a series of remixes by leading electronic music producers, all of which went to a chart position of no1, no2, or no3, including Cafe del Mar (Tale of Us remix, Bladerunner (Maceoplex remix), Sacred Cycles (Adam Beyer and Bart Skills remix).

In Jan 2020, Renaissance made its debut in Tulum, Mexico, with a incredible line up : Adam Beyer, Ida Endberg, Charlotee DeWitte, Danny Tenaglia, Nicole Moudaber, Dubfire, Blancah, and Sirsax.

objects.title: Tale of Us - Afterlife @ Zamna
objects.content: This January 4th, Tale of Use will bring their epic show to Zamna.

object.title: Papaya Playa Project (PPP)
object.content: Hotel Papaya Playa Project stands as one of the iconic spots in Tulum.

metafields.title: Address
metafields.value: Km 4.5, Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Zona Costera Tulum, 77780 Mexico

metafields.title: description
metafields.value:
As the host of the legendary monthly full-moon parties at its beachside club, PPP has been the precursors & active promoter of the electronic scene in Tulum.

Solomun Boiler Room DJ Set

World class Dj's,  Musicians & PPP's resident DJ's 

(We recommend to watch this video in preparation for your Tulum visit)


If you're into the electronic, house, techno music, this is "a must go place", this may be as one of the best clubs @ Mexico. 


When do full moon parties occur? 

Every month on the Saturday closest to the full moon

PPP maintains a limited capacity and priority goes to hotel guests and close community members.

We are official PPP RP's.

Drop us a line if you have questions or want to reserve a spot with anticipation.


Table Reservation

metadata.caption: Papaya Playa Classic Saturday Party

Dramian/ MX

Litos/Tulum

Rosano/ Tulum


Chef by Edher Cervantes

metadata.name: PPP

metadata.caption: The Papaya Playa Classic Party

objects.title: Roman Flügel - KM 4.5 @ PPP
objects.content:
Mr. Roman welcome back /. 

From: 5:00 pm to 11:00 pm


The second event in this event series takes us back to Papaya Playa Project. 

The boys are back in town, and the tales of KM 4.5 continue to unfold in the name of music and connection. In this intimate location, you’ll be taken on a journey of sound curated by seasoned producer Roman Flügel.

metafields.title: extra_content
metafields.value:
Artists

Roman Flügel

One of the biggest names in the German electronic music scene.   Active since the early 1990's, Flugel is a chameleon visiting many styles from ambient/idm to house, techno, electro, and leftfield.  



VENUE

Papaya Playa Project 

Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila Km 4.5, Tulum Beach, Zona Costera, Tulum, Q.R.



TABLE RESERVATION

objects.title: Dinner by the Moon @ PPP June 19 2021
objects.content:
Line up:

  • Manfredas
  • Eric Duncan
  • Dramian

Chef by Edher Cervantes

STARTS AT 5:00 PM END AT 11:30 PM

Doors close at 10 pm. 

Dress Code: Dinner-Casual.

Phones are not allowed or you can leave them at the entrance on PPP phone check.

metafields.title: extra_content
metafields.value:
Tickets & Table Reservation

Table Reservation


PAPAYA PLAYA ANNOUCEMENT:

Dear friends,

We want to let you know that as a preventive action due to COVID-19, the Government of the State of Quintana Roo has included emergency measures that must be observed by residents, visitors, and businesses within the municipality of Tulum. Every restaurant, hotel, bar, and company is obliged to comply. For this reason, we are required by law to finish any gathering before midnight.

As we adapt our plans, we are sure you will have a perfect Papaya Playa Project journey, starting at 5 pm to finish at 11:30 pm. Please be mindful of this new time, we want you to be able to make the best of your table reservation for The Dinner by the Moon on Saturday.

The circulation and transit of people will not be possible between 12 midnight and 5 am. All guests must be home or inside the hotel before midnight. All businesses must be closed at midnight.

metadata.name: PPP

objects.title: Damian Lazarus @ Bagatelle June 2021
objects.content:
Damian Lazarus DJ, producer, and owner of Crosstown Rebels and Rebellion come again to Tulum at Bagatelle Dinner Sessions to lead us on a new magical journey. His music is a constant flow of creativity and innovation that unleashes a positive spirit in his audience.

Line up:

  • Damian Lazarus

From: 18:00 to 24:00

Recommendations:

Dress Code: Tulum Vibes. No Swimsuit.
MAIN EVENT ITS ON THE BEACH CLUB (OUTDOORS)

metafields.title: extra_content
metafields.value:
Artists

Damian Lazarus

Damian Lazarus is one of the most respected exponents of the contemporary house and techno scene as a DJ, producer, storyteller, and Crosstown Rebels and Rebellion owner.

It is known for its expertise in performing in magical outdoor locations such as jungles, beaches, deserts, mountains, and archeological ruins.

Damian launches the careers of many scene artists with his label Crosstown Rebels such as Jamie Jones, Maceo Plex, to name a few. 

In 2020 Crosstown Rebels released his new album 'Flourish' which is full of style, nuances of texture, creativity, and mystical greatness.

"Open your mind, embrace the magic, and get ready for the next bewitching chapter..."



VENUE

Bagatelle

Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila 8, Tulum Beach, 77760 Q.R.

object.title: Bagatelle Tulum
object.content: Bagatelle Tulum is positioned as one of the most vibrant and influential clubs currently in Tulum.

metafields.title: Address
metafields.value: Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila 8, Tulum Beach, QR

metafields.title: description
metafields.value:
With a fantastic and refined vibes, Bagatelle has been able to mix the mediterranean style with the characteristic Tulum style into its own brand.

Until now @ 2021 Bagatell has demonstrated their will to keep the Electronic Music scene up by hosting some of the best shows hosted on the high end bar restaurant area during this year:


- Damian Lazarus

- Artbat


Bagatelle is a contemporary French Mediterranean restaurant founded in 2008. It's an elegant and festive place.

Table Reservation

Damian Lazarus is one of the most respected exponents of the contemporary house and techno scene as a DJ, producer, storyteller, and Crosstown Rebels and Rebellion owner.

It is known for its expertise in performing in magical outdoor locations such as jungles, beaches, deserts, mountains, and archeological ruins.

Damian launches the careers of many scene artists with his label Crosstown Rebels such as Jamie Jones, Maceo Plex, to name a few. 

In 2020 Crosstown Rebels released his new album 'Flourish' which is full of style, nuances of texture, creativity, and mystical greatness.

"Open your mind, embrace the magic, and get ready for the next bewitching chapter..."



VENUE

Bagatelle

Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila 8, Tulum Beach, 77760 Q.R.

venue.title: Bagatelle Tulum
venue.content: Bagatelle Tulum is positioned as one of the most vibrant and influential clubs currently in Tulum.

metafields.title: Address
metafields.value: Carr. Tulum-Boca Paila 8, Tulum Beach, QR

metafields.title: description
metafields.value:
With a fantastic and refined vibes, Bagatelle has been able to mix the mediterranean style with the characteristic Tulum style into its own brand.

Until now @ 2021 Bagatell has demonstrated their will to keep the Electronic Music scene up by hosting some of the best shows hosted on the high end bar restaurant area during this year:


- Damian Lazarus

- Artbat


Bagatelle is a contemporary French Mediterranean restaurant founded in 2008. It's an elegant and festive place.

Table Reservation

objects.title: Dinner by the Moon @ PPP June 12 2021
objects.content:
ONLY TABLES AVAILABLE. 

Due to new COVID restrictions, SINGLE TICKETS will not be available

Line up:

  • Dyed Soundorom
  • Jimeno
  • Rosano

Chef by Edher Cervantes

STARTS AT 5:00 PM END AT 11:30 PM

Phones will be checked at the entrance

metafields.title: extra_content
metafields.value:
Tickets & Table Reservation

Table Reservation



PAPAYA PLAYA ANNOUCEMENT:

Dear friends,

We want to let you know that as a preventive action due to COVID-19, the Government of the State of Quintana Roo has included emergency measures that must be observed by residents, visitors, and businesses within the municipality of Tulum. Every restaurant, hotel, bar, and company is obliged to comply. For this reason, we are required by law to finish any gathering before midnight.

As we adapt our plans, we are sure you will have a perfect Papaya Playa Project journey, starting at 5 pm to finish at 11:30 pm. Please be mindful of this new time, we want you to be able to make the best of your table reservation for The Dinner by the Moon on Saturday.

The circulation and transit of people will not be possible between 12 midnight and 5 am. All guests must be home or inside the hotel before midnight. All businesses must be closed at midnight.

object.title: Papaya Playa Project (PPP)
object.content: Hotel Papaya Playa Project stands as one of the iconic spots in Tulum.

metafields.title: Address
metafields.value: Km 4.5, Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Zona Costera Tulum, 77780 Mexico

metafields.title: description
metafields.value:
As the host of the legendary monthly full-moon parties at its beachside club, PPP has been the precursors & active promoter of the electronic scene in Tulum.

Solomun Boiler Room DJ Set

World class Dj's,  Musicians & PPP's resident DJ's 

(We recommend to watch this video in preparation for your Tulum visit)


If you're into the electronic, house, techno music, this is "a must go place", this may be as one of the best clubs @ Mexico. 


When do full moon parties occur? 

Every month on the Saturday closest to the full moon

PPP maintains a limited capacity and priority goes to hotel guests and close community members.

We are official PPP RP's.

Drop us a line if you have questions or want to reserve a spot with anticipation.


Table Reservation

objects.title: Dinner by the Moon May 2021
objects.content:
Saturday Night Dinner With the Moon represents Papaya Playa Project’s legacy as the original meeting place for creative soul-seekers, a time to find each other, to share the elevated awareness brought on by a perfect meal, the night’s energy, music, and performances worth enjoying.

Line up:

  • Mental
  • Rebolledo B2B Dramian
  • Rosano

Menu by Chef Edher Cervantes

*COVID-19 Hygiene measures and social distance. The use of face mask is mandatory. Limited Capacity. Dress code dinner casual.
